original_query: SELECT MIN(pl.Id) FROM postLinks as pl, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.CommentCount<=8 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-21 12:30:43' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-07 01:11:03' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views<=40 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 19:11:25' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-11 22:26:42' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -1 AND posts.CommentCount <= 8 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-21 12:30:43' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-07 01:11:03')
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E4.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views <= 40 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 19:11:25' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 22:26:42')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2E4.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E4E3 WHERE E1.RelatedPostId=E2E4E3.Id)
